root.name: Zoobles! Spring to Life!
root.description: OverviewWelcome to the world of Zoobles. In Zoobles! Spring to Life!, players will get a Zooble of their own and watch as it grows up. You'll be able to choose one out of 18 Zoobles to be your best friend. Gameplay involves exploring six different worlds, meeting other Zoobles, and earning Zoints (Zooble points, duh) to unlock 120 accessory items for your Zooble's home, called a Happitat.
